verses.1: Tua ciangin Job in Pasian dawng a,
verses.2: “Kuamah in Pasian a zawhzawh lohna a teltakin ka thei ta hi.
verses.3: Mi khatpeuh Pasian tawh thu a kinial ding hileh tul khat sungah khatvei nangawn dawng thei lo ding hi.
verses.4: Amah pil mahmah a, vanglian mahmah hi. Kua in khauh takin nial a, nial paisuak zo ahi hiam?
verses.5: Pasian in mualte liingsak a, tawlngasak lo hi. Ama hehna tawh mualte a lumlet hi.
verses.6: Amah in leitung lok gawp a, a khuampite kiliing hi.
verses.7: Amah in ni a suak lo dingin thu pia a, aksite sincip hi.
verses.8: Amah bek in vanpi zal a, tuipi tuihualte tuancil hi.
verses.9: Amah pen van a a om Khawlei-uikai, Zawlzawng, Seguk le Khanglam aksite a bawlpa ahi hi.
verses.10: Amah in kuama theih zawh loh na lian tampi bawl a, kuama sim zawh loh nalamdang tampi sem hi.
verses.11: “Ka kiangah amah hong pai a, keʼn amah ka mu thei kei hi. Amah gam tangtang napi-in, amah ka theithei kei hi.
verses.12: Amah in la khia nuam leh a khaktan zo ding kua om ahi hiam? Bang hih na hi hiam, kuaʼn ci thei ding ahi hiam?
verses.13: Pasian in ama hehna dokkik het lo mah ding hi. Rahabʼ pawlte nangawn a khe nuai ah kun uh hi.
verses.14: Tua ahih ciangin keimah in bangci dawn theih dinga, amah ka nial nading kammal bangci muh ding ka hi hiam?
verses.15: Kei ka dik hangin amah ka dawng thei kei hi. Kei hong mawhsak pa tungah hong hehpih ding ka nget kul hi.
verses.16: Thukhen zumah amah samin hong pai hi ta mah leh zong ka thumna hong ngai dingin ka um tuan kei hi.
verses.17: Bang hang hiam cih leh thu themno khat hangin nakpi takin kei hong hih a, thu om lopi-in gimna tampi hong thuaksak hi.
verses.18: Ka hu nangawn hong sangsak man lo a, lungkhamna tawh kei hong kidimsak hi.
verses.19: Thatang hat thu ding hileh, amah hat mahmah a, thutang kituh hi leng, kua in thukhen zumah amah sam zo ding ahi hiam?
verses.20: Kei ka dik hangin keima kam mah siksanin kei hong man dinga, mawhbaang lo ka hih hangin keima kampau hong leh heisak ding hi.
verses.21: Paubaanna ka neih loh hangin kei a thupi-in ka kingaihsun tuan het kei a, ka nuntakna ka kih hi.
verses.22: Thu khat bek om hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a paubaang lote le a gilote susia khawm hi, ka ci hi.
verses.23: Lauhuai lianpi hong tung pakin sihna a om ciangin mawhbaang loteʼ thumna a nuihsan lel hi.
verses.24: Migiloteʼ khut sungah leitung kipia a, amah in thukhen mangteʼ mit a tuncipsak hi - amah hikeileh kua hi ding ahi hiam?
verses.25: “Laitaite sangin ka hun nawh tai zaw a, beipak ahih manin nopna ngah kha lo hi.
verses.26: Pumpeeng gunkuang bangin ka hun nawhpai a, muvanlai sa bawh bangin a nawh len hi.
verses.27: Ka dahnate kimangngilh bawlin kimaitaisak ding ci taleng zong,
verses.28: a dikin nong seh loh ding lamtak thei khin ka hih manin ka thuak ding thute hangin kei ka lau mahmah hi.
verses.29: Kei a mawhin hong kiseh veve ding ahihleh bang hangin a mawkna-in na sem ding ka hi hiam?
verses.30: Satpiang tawh kei kisilin, vuttui tawh ka khut sawp taleng,
verses.31: buannawng sungah kei nong hencip veve dinga, ka puan ninte in a kihhuai hong suaksak ding hi.
verses.32: Amah ka dawn theih nadingin amah, kei bangin mi hi lo a, thukhen zumah thu kineih pih theih hi lo hi.
verses.33: Ko tegel kikalah thu hong khen ding khat om thei henla, ko tegel tungah aana hong zang ding khat om thei hileh,
verses.34: kei hong kisatna ciang hong paih khiatsak dinga, kei tungah lauhuaina lianpite hong om nawn lo ding hi.
verses.35: Bangbang ahi zongin amah kihta het loin ka pau ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keiʼ om zia ding bangin kei ka om loh lamtak teltakin ka kithei hi.
